title: Some random guy gave me a mystery gift post-game
body:
Some random guy sent me one after i jokingly thanked him post game for saving me. Tried to add him as friend after but he wouldnt accept. I am leaving this here hoping he reads the forums.

I come from a 3rd world country and gifts aren't given around lightly. Every little scrap is earned by busting ass and acts of kindness like this are almost unheard of.

I want to say thank you "WrathofHolmes". I will remember you whenever I play my new festive maokai skin :D
